original_definition: 'anti-condensation heater' means an anti-condensation heater where the heating capacity depends on either the ambient temperature or the ambient humidity or both;
generated_definition: 'anti-condensation heater' means a device that heats the air in a refrigerating appliance to prevent condensation.

Article 2: ‘anti-condensation heater’ means a heater which prevents condensation on the refrigeration appliance;
